name: Bedside Commode
specifications: Metal frame; adjustable height; plastic seat and pail; armrests; rubber-tipped feet; typically supports up to 100 kg.
function: Provides portable toileting for patients with limited mobility.
usage: Wear gloves; position commode near bed; assist patient; ensure pail is securely placed and locked; clean patient after use.
maintenance: Clean and disinfect seat and pail after each use; check stability; inspect frame and rubber feet regularly.
warning: Improper cleaning or unstable placement, risking infection or falls.
